response.final_text:
I can’t access a tool called "nonexistent_tool" — it doesn’t exist in my available tool set. I can, however, use the tools I do have:

- get_current_time — return the current date/time
- calculator — evaluate math expressions
- multi_tool_use.parallel — run the above tools in parallel

Tell me what you want to do and I’ll use one of those. Examples:
- "What time is it now?" (I’ll call get_current_time)
- "Compute 12345 * 678" (I’ll call calculator)
- "Give me the time and compute 2^20" (I can run both in parallel)

Which would you like me to run, or do you want to describe a different task?
